name: Lighthouz AI
long_description:
Lighthouz AI is building AI procurement specialists to automate B2B purchasing for manufacturers. It 2x'es the productivity of procurement teams by automating manual workflows and increases cost savings. 

Businesses waste $30B *per year* doing procurement tasks manually using emails and spreadsheets. These tasks include entering data on ERP, creating purchase orders, verifying invoices, and communicating with vendors. 

Lighthouz's AI procurement specialists autonomously handles manual procurement workflows. It integrates with emails and ERP systems. Our multi AI agent system is powered by dynamic knowledge graphs constructed from unstructured data (emails, PDFs, images, etc). By automating manual tasks, procurement teams can focus on strategic tasks and decision making. 

Our team has 20+ years of combined AI experience: 
- Srijan has been a GaTech CS professor, was a research scientist at Google, did postdoc at Stanford, PhD at University of Maryland and undergrad at IIT. 
- Sonali was a lead AI engineer at Progressive insurance, American Family insurance, Halliburton, did her MS at University of Washington, and undergrad at IIT.
one_liner: AI procurement specialists to automate B2B purchasing forâ€¦
